location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:389 x 234 mm, on sheet 412 x 327 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Copy based on a map of Asia drawn to scale 1:1,000,000 issued by the War Office with adjustments controlled by traverses made during a survey carried out in February 1933 for the Iraq Petroleum Co. Ltd.Shows roads and wells with boundary indicated by dash-dot line. Inscriptions:On recto in the upper right-hand corner in pencil: ‘F. 88 p. 84’.In the left centre an annotation in Arabic and Charles C. Mylles’ signature.
